Mark Olencki

23 Lawren Cook

Position Forward

Class Junior

Height 6-0

High School Christ Church Episcopal School

Hometown Greenville, S.C.

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2020-21: Played in 23 games ... Scored 68 points and had 58 rebounds on the season ... In the opener against Winthrop (11/25) scored four points with five rebounds ... Against Erskine (1/2) had eight points and four rebounds ... In the first game against ETSU (1/14) had eight points and two rebounds ... At UNC Greensboro (1/30) had a season-high six rebounds ... Pulled down five rebounds against Chattanooga (2/6) ... Had six points in each of the contests against Samford (2/11, 2/13) ... In the Southern Conference Tournament, had five points in the opening game against UNC Greensboro (3/4) ... In the championship game had two points and four rebounds.

2019-20: Appeared in all 30 games, including five starts ... Recorded 112 points (3.7 ppg) and had 93 rebounds (3/1 rpg), along with 18 steals and 13 assists ... Scored a career-high 10 points twice â€“ against Coastal Carolina (11/17) and Erskine (12/17) ... Notched her first collegiate double-double with 10 points and 10 rebounds against Erskine ... Played a season-high 30 minutes while also grabbing a career-best 11 rebounds in victory over Western Carolina (2/22).

2018-19: Did not see action.

HIGH SCHOOL: A three-year letter winner at Christ Church Episcopal School, led her team to three straight 26-win seasons while only dropping eight games ... Led her team to two state championships and one runner-up finish ... Named to the All-Region team and was also named Team MVP her junior year... Earned Rookie of the Year and Defensive Player of the Year honors her freshman year.

PERSONAL: Born on January 6, 2000 ... Daughter of Garrick and Emily Cook ... Majoring in intercultural studies.

HONORS & AWARDS:

- 2019-20 Southern Conference Academic Honor Roll

- 2020-21 Southern Conference Academic Honor Roll
